actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to increase the penalty for committing certain Federal and State crimes with a firearm or while unlawfully carrying a firearm.

summary.text: Increases the penalty for committing Federal and State crimes with a firearm or while unlawfully carrying a firearm to imprisonment for not less than 5 years.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to increase the penalty for committing certain Federal and State crimes with a firearm or while unlawfully carrying a firearm.
